feed.title: ZonePane Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve activity_handle_undo action by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/960
  • Add title to content if post is a Note by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/958
  • Fallback to blog-user if user is disabled by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/957
  • transform object to URI by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/965
  • Bump @wordpress/blocks from 13.10.0 to 14.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/964
  • Add custom Preview for "Fediverse" by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/944
  • Fix Fediverse preview for "blog actor only" mode. by @Menrath in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/966
  • Support comment_previously_approved setting by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/962
  • Hide sticky posts that are not public by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/969

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.0.2...4.1.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Embeds: only revert to URL if there is one by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/975
  • Fixed Migration by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/commit/82786d16298e2385a6181336da57cf9fcb81d0de

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.1.0...4.1.1

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Users: do not display submenus to users who cannot author posts by @jeherve in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/974
  • Imrove "FEP-b2b8: Long-form Text" support by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/982
  • Refactor get_by_id Method Using Switch Statement for Improved Readabi… by @bgr8 in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/979
  • Reuse constants once they're defined by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/984
  • Use version constant directly by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/985
  • CLI: Remove meta command by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/986
  • CLI: Remove unneeded translation functions by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/987
  • Rename Users-Collection to Actors to be more specific by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/968
  • Add baseline tests for Post::get_type() by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/991
  • Settings: Fix styles to align with rest of wp-admin by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/992
  • Better Post-Formats support by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/990
  • Make plain permalink notice more actionable by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/994
  • Ensure that ?author=0 resolves to blog user by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/996

New Contributors

  • @bgr8 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/979

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.1.1...4.2.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • PHPCS: Fix phpunit files by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/995
  • Add Mastodon Apps status provider by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/978
  • Don't overwrite an existing wp-tests-config.php by @akirk in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1003
  • Improve Image-Handling by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/999
  • Have better checks if audience should be set or not by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1002

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.2.0...4.2.1

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Copy image, because otherwise it will be deleted. by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1005
  • Outsource Constants to a separate file by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1006
  • Generate unique ID by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1004
  • Make change log entries mandatory with every PR by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/988
  • Too many READMEs by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1009
  • Show '⁂ Fediverse Preview' link in Row-Actions by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/989
  • Change preview showing the name instead of the preferredUsername by @Menrath in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1011
  • Add an early return filter for get_upload_dir() by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1008
  • Welcome to the project/team @obenland by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1010
  • EMA: Fix fatal when account is invalid by @akirk in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1014
  • Editor: avoid errors when switching to edit a Pattern block by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1023
  • Prevention against self pings by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1022
  • Fixed: Missing attachement-type for enclosures by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1021
  • Actors: deprecate as User_Collection throughout by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1013
  • Test with php 8.4 by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1024
  • Show Follower Name instead of Avatar on mobile view by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1016
  • Do not escape the Username. by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1018
  • Repo Gardening: automatically label more PRs, & auto-label issues by @jeherve in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1026
  • Add basic validation to enclosure function by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1028

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.2.1...4.3.0
